testcase.name: All customers should show up on manage customers module populating the account information of the customer
testcase.system-out: Given Go to gmibank.com home page...........................................passed And Click to User Account Menu and Click to Sign In.........................passed And Enter the username with valid credentail................................passed And Enter the pasword with valid credentail.................................passed And Click to Sign in button.................................................passed And Click to My Operations drop down menu and Click to Manage Costumers.....passed And click to last page button...............................................passed Then A customer should show up at total nine head on account information of the customer.passed

testcase.name: There should be a View option where customer can be navigated to all customer info and see edit button there
There should be an Edit button where all customer information can be populated
testcase.system-out: And go back to manage costumers page........................................passed Then There should be Edit button where all customer.........................passed

testcase.name: There should be Edit button where all customerThe Edit portal can allow user to create or update the user info
testcase.system-out: And Click to Edit button....................................................passed And City textbox is updated.................................................passed And Click to Save button in the Edit Page...................................passed Then The Edit portal can allow user to update the user info.................passed

testcase.name: User can delete a customer, but seeing a message if the user is sure about deletion
testcase.system-out: And Confirming that a customer is registered with ID number.................passed And Click to Delete button..................................................passed And seeing a message if the user is sure about deletion.....................passed Then User can delete a customer.............................................passed
